drawCardsAndStartNewRound.English: Draw cards and start new round

step-2.1.English: 2.1: Players take turns taking actions or passing

step-3.0.English: 3.0: Starting player decides the order the battleground and path combats are resolved

step-3.1.English: 3.1: Count the number of attacking icons

step-3.3.English: 3.3: Discard defending cards to subtract more icons

step-3.6.English: 3.6: If path, Shadow team gains corruption tokens equal to excess attack

step-3.7.English: 3.7: Winning side takes control (Shadow team takes control of paths facedown)

step-4.1.English: 4.1: If the difference between scores is 10 or more, the team with the higher score wins

step-4.2.English: 4.2: If the last path combat has been resolved, the team with the higher score wins

step-5.2.English: 5.2: Pass the starting player token to the next player

newRound: moved the first player token and increased the round number.
cycleCard: because it is not associated with a cycle pile. Please drag the card instead.
eliminateCard: because it is not associated with an eliminated pile. Please drag the card instead.
togglePeeking: stopped peeking at a card in
started peeking at a card in

steps.labelId: 2.1: Players take turns taking actions or passing
3.0: Starting player decides the order the battleground and path combats are resolved
3.1: Count the number of attacking icons
3.3: Discard defending cards to subtract more icons
3.6: If path, Shadow team gains corruption tokens equal to excess attack
3.7: Winning side takes control (Shadow team takes control of paths facedown)
4.1: If the difference between scores is 10 or more, the team with the higher score wins
4.2: If the last path combat has been resolved, the team with the higher score wins
5.2: Pass the starting player token to the next player

then: Strider was removed from the game.
